code: import fire from'../fire.js';export var login=function login(){var provider=new fire.auth.GoogleAuthProvider();provider.addScope('profile');provider.addScope('email');fire.auth().signInWithPopup(provider).then(function(res){return console.log(res.user);}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var logout=function logout(){fire.auth().signOut().then(function(res){return console.log('logout successful');}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};
